name: ZIP File Format (PKWARE)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">zip, ZIP</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: A de facto industry standard for cross-platform data exchange and efficient data storage, combining data compression and data encryption in a portable archive format for a set of related files.
